fields.headline: News in brief
fields.bodyText: Escape the hordes Adventures in the Gobi desert and horse treks into Siberian forests are now available with the formation of a company specialising in tours to Mongolia. Panoramic Journeys will allow visitors of all ages to explore this little known country, and itineraries will also include cultural tours through its heartland. Call 01608 811690 or visit the website. Child's play Walks Worldwide has announced a new series of walking tours tailored towards children in areas as diverse as the Czech Republic (complete with fairytale castles), the Pyrenees and Jordan. And when the kids get tired of walking there are camels or donkeys available to take the strain. Walks Worldwide 01524 242000. An Indian spring Air India launched new direct flights this week from London to Ahmedabad on Fridays and Sundays. For more details visit www.airindia.com.
